entry.title: Almond Makeup Melting Cleansing Balm
entry.summary:
Vendor: Love Attack
Type: Cleanser
Price: 25.00

Who doesn't love a good cleansing balm? Melt away makeup and remove impurities at the end of the day with our brand new soothing and calming skin cleansing balm. Made using a blend of all natural ingredients and organic botanical oils, this balm will leave skin feeling clean, nourished and hydrated. 

Suitable for daily use and perfect for all skin types. Recommended as part of your PM skincare routine. No fragrance added.

Key Ingredients and Benefits

  • Organic Sweet Almond Oil - This beautiful botanical oil relieves dryness, keeps skin hydrated and relieves itching sensations due to it being naturally rich in Vitamin E. It is also perfect for those with more oily skin as it cleans impurities, dirt and excess oil from pores. Almond oil is quickly absorbed and keeps moisture in your skin balanced.
  • Organic Sunflower Oil - Improve skin texture and redness with this beautiful anti-inflammatory oil. Rich in Linoleic Acid (Omega-6 fatty acid) and Vitamin E, this oil is perfect for those with dry skin as it improves hydration.Rich in antioxidants such as Vitamin A, C , D and E , this oil will also help fight acne causing bacteria while protecting skin.
  • Organic Castor Seed Oil - A natural hydrating and moisturizing oil which has antibacterial properties and is rich in antioxidants. Naturally antibacterial and anti-inflammatory, this oil is rich in ricinoleic acid which hydrates and treats inflamed skin.
  • White Kaolin Clay - A mild and gentle clay which provides a gentle exfoliation which clears pores, soothes skin and absorbs excess oil which can cause blemishes or acne. Continued use of kaolin clay can also improve skins overall appearance and tone.
  • Colloidal Oatmeal - Proven to sooth redness and skin irritations caused by common skin issues such as acne, eczema and psoriasis. Restorative, hydrating and soothing, this amazing superfood deeply cleanses and provides a gentle exfoliation.

How to use

Scoop out a desired amount with dry fingers and massage onto skin. Add water to emulsify. Rinse off excess balm with water or wipe away with a damp cloth or reusable cotton round. Pairs perfectly with our Eye Makeup Remover and Cleansing Oil.

Full Ingredients List 

Prunus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil*, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Oil*, Stearic Acid, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil*, Cetearyl Olivate, Sorbitan Olivate, Cetyl Alcohol, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride*, Glycerine, Avena Sativa (Oat) Powder, White Kaolin Clay, Tocopherol (Vitamin E), Xanthan gum. *Organic ingredient 

Product Information

  • All natural, cruelty free, vegan cleanser
  • Fragrance free, PEG free, non toxic ingredients
  • Not recommended for topical use for those with a tree nut allergy
  • 4 oz recyclable/reusable glass jar packaging with recyclable plastic lid
  • Due to being an oil based product, it is preservative free. Please do not store in shower and avoid direct contact with water. Apply using dry fingers and emulsify when it is on the skin.
  • Do not get directly in eyes
  • Store in a cool, dry place
  • Shelf life 12 months after opening with proper storage
  • Stop use immediately if any irritation occurs

entry.title: Reusable Organic Cotton Facial Rounds - Pink
entry.summary:
Vendor: Love Attack
Type: Washable Reusable Organic Cotton Rounds
Price: 15.00

Reusable bubblegum pink facial rounds made from 100% organic cotton! These reusable cotton rounds are the perfect replacement for single-use cotton pads, cotton balls and make up remover wipes. Each reusable cotton round can be washed over 200 times making them the perfect eco-friendly alternative in your skincare routine. 

Features + Benefits

  • 10-pack of 3" diameter pads and mesh wash/carry bag both made from 100% GOTS Certified organic cotton 
  • Organic cotton reusable facial rounds can be washed over 200 times
  • Sustainable and eco-friendly alternative to disposable cotton pads and make up remover wipes
  • 3 layers of organic cotton make these reusable cotton rounds extremely soft and extremely durable
  • Pink coloured reusable cotton facial rounds are perfect for applying and removing skincare and beauty products

How to use

Use these organic cotton face wipes to remove makeup, cleanse your face, for applying toner or whatever else you need them for throughout your skincare routine. Once used, simply throw used rounds into your new wash bag and toss them into your machine.

Make sure you wash all your pads before first use. Wash on medium cycle. Air-dry pads after wash to maintain shape or line dry.

entry.title: Plastic Free Biodegradable Hair Ties - Black
entry.summary:
Vendor: Love Attack
Type: Scrunchies + Hair Ties
Price: 15.00

Your new favourite eco-friendly hair accessory is here! Love Attack Biodegradable Hair Ties are 100% plastic free and made from organic cotton and natural rubber. Each set comes with 20 flat hair ties. Hair tie paper packaging is 100% recyclable. When you're done with your hair ties, simply throw them in your home compost bin. Being made out of 100% natural materials, hair ties are fully biodegradable and compostable.

Made from 

100% Natural Rubber + GOTS Certified Organic Cotton

entry.title: Organic Biodegradable Charcoal Konjac Sponge
entry.summary:
Vendor: Love Attack
Type: Konjac Sponge
Price: 10.00

Introducing the perfect beauty and skincare tool for all skin types but particularly for oily or acne prone skin. This amazing organic and biodegradable konjac sponge is infused with activated charcoal which acts like a magnet to dirt, oil and impurities in your skin.

This sponge can be used on its own or paired with your favourite cleanser for a deep clean.

This sponge comes packaged in a cute 100% recyclable paper box making the entire product 100% waste free!

Each sponge lasts approx. 100 uses and can be placed in your home compost bin once finished with.

These sponges are all natural, cruelty free, vegan, biodegradable and compostable!

What is Konjac?

Konjac is a 100% natural and soluble vegetable fibre which is 100% biodegradable

How to use

For first use, simply run sponge under running water for 2-3 minutes and watch as the sponge expands and becomes soft.

Squeeze out excess water and add your favourite cleanser or used on its own in light circular motions. Not only will this sponge absorb impurities and excess oil from the skin but it will also provide a gentle exfoliation. Once done, simply rinse and hang by its string to dry. 

Whenever you wish to use sponge, simply reactivate it under warm water. 

Sponge can be hung to dry using attached string on bathroom sink or in the shower.

Made from 

100% organic biodegradable konjac sponge and infused with activated charcoal powder

entry.title: Organic Biodegradable Bamboo Cotton Buds (200 Swabs)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Love Attack
Type: Organic Biodegradable Bamboo Cotton Buds
Price: 8.00

An all natural, eco-friendly and sustainable swap for single use disposable cotton swabs. Organic Biodegradable Bamboo Cotton Buds are plastic free, waste free, non GMO, biodegradable, compostable, cruelty free and vegan.

Organic cotton is super soft, hypoallergenic and safe for use on even the most sensitive skin. Organic cotton is grown without the use of pesticides, is free from bleach and 0 chemicals or fragrances are used during manufacturing.

Use these biodegradable swabs for touching up, removing and applying make up and skincare products, cleaning your ears, fixing nail polish mistakes, cleaning up pets, cleansing baby’s delicate eye or ear areas + for anything else you would normally use a swab for!

Features + Benefits

  • One pack comes with 200 biodegradable swabs
  • Packaging is 100% recyclable 
  • Eco-friendly and sustainable swap for disposable cotton swabs
  • Made from 100% organic cotton and natural bamboo
  • 100% plastic free product
  • 100% biodegradable and home compostable 
  • Hypoallergenic, pesticide and bleach free

How to use

Use these swabs exactly as you would use regular disposable swabs, for cleaning and grooming. The difference? Once you have finished, pop these biodegradable swabs in your home compost bin after use. Recycle paper packaging once empty.

Do not insert directly into ear canal. Keep out of reach of children.

entry.title: Eye Makeup Remover + Cleansing Oil
entry.summary:
Vendor: Love Attack
Type: Cleanser
Price: 15.00

Handcrafted from 100% organic, cold-pressed botanical oils, this unscented eye make up remover is designed to gently loosen and strip away eye and brow make up without causing any damage or discomfort to your delicate eye area.

This cleansing oil is designed to remove dirt, oil and impurities from your skin. These oils have been specifically curated to leave skin feeling soothed, nourished and hydrated and most importantly...clean!

Key Ingredients + Benefits

  • Organic Sunflower Oil | Sunflower Oil has high amounts of Vitamins A,B,D and E as well as minerals, lecithin and unsaturated fatty acids which are all great for your skin.

  • Organic Sweet Almond Oil | Sweet Almond Oil is an excellent emollient and is known to soften and recondition the skin. High in Vitamin D and proteins as well as Linoleic acid, which all help skin retain moisture as well as treating dry, irritated skin.

  • Organic Golden Jojoba Oil | Jojoba Oil is rich in Vitamin E and leaves skin healthy and glowing. It is also anti-inflammatory and can be used to treat dryness in the skin as well as help repair damaged skin.

How to use

Pump 1-3 drops of oil on fingertips. Massaging onto eye area to gently remove eye and brow make up. Add water to emulsify the product. Pay special attention to eye lashes and eye brows. Wipe away residue with our reusable black cotton facial rounds and continue on to your regular cleanser. 

Do not get directly in eyes. 

Bottles left in direct sunlight may lighten in colour over time due to the natural botanical oils used. To maintain beautiful golden colour, please store in a cool dark place out of direct light.

Ingredients

Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Oil* , Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil* ,  Simmondsia Chinensis (Golden Jojoba) Oil* 

*100% Organic Ingredient

Product Information

  • Organic, Vegan, Cruelty-Free and Kosher

  • 50ml recyclable glass bottle and pump dispenser

  • Not recommended for those with a tree nut allergy
